article.Heading: High expectations from Modi govt; still hopeful: Tarun Khanna
article.Summary: Tarun Khanna, Professor, Harvard Business School, still has high expectations from the Modi government and says it should focus on implementing the already announced policies and it needs to put substance behind these announcements
article.Body:
The Indian Budget announcement on Monday garnered mixed reactions from various economists and agencies from across the world.

Tarun Khanna, Professor, Harvard Business School, still has high expectations from the Modi government and says it should focus on implementing the already announced policies and it needs to put substance behind these announcements.

He believes that the government initiatives will take full term to show positive results for the Indian economy. However, he does admit that the Budget misses to be output-oriented. Khanna also raised certain red flag over governments' recapitalisation plan for the banks.
